title: What happened to the Russians’ next generation infantry rifle project? Is the AK-12 canceled? - Quora

response.answer_text: The AK-12 is currently being deployed to Russian special forces after a long development period where the AK-12 basically revert back to an AK-74 with some modern Western style convinces and a much larger price tag. Supposedly the regular army will be receiving them as well but we will have to want and see if that happens.
